manifest.name: PDF Folder to Markdowns
manifest.description: Convert a folder of PDFs into a folder of Markdown files with embedded PDFs. Ideal for users migrating PDF notes from apps like Boox or organizing reference materials inside Obsidian, ensuring a seamless workflow for note-taking and knowledge management.
manifest.author: CrisHood

data.manifestValue: Convert a folder of PDFs into a folder of Markdown files with embedded PDFs. Ideal for users migrating PDF notes from apps like Boox or organizing reference materials inside Obsidian, ensuring a seamless workflow for note-taking and knowledge management.
data.communityListValue: Convert a folder of PDFs into Markdown files with embedded PDFs
